city_descr: Write, please, an attractive and juicy text with hash tags for attention-grabbing facebook post relevant to budget travellers about the city [city]. Please, do not use any emojis and title.
city_title: Propose, please, 1 creative title for this post: '[description]'. Return, please, only the title as a string without the inverted commas.
city_routes: Provide me, please, with the 3 most popular, attractive and exciting cities in Europe that are furthest from [city]. Separate each city name with a new line and do not put in city list any commas, numbers, backslashes, bullet points etc. Please provide your response without any accompanying phrases.
aea_descr: Write a seo-frendly description of [title] options in the city of [city] relevant for budget travellers like in this example: '[description]'
aea_opts: In the city of [city] find most popular [title] options relevant for budget travellers. Put in your answer the options' names only. Separate each option with a new line. Do not include in your reply any commas, numbers, dishes or bullet points
aea_opt_descr: For option [name] of the [title] in the city of [city] provide, please, a SEO-friendly description relevant for budget travellers. For example: '[description]'
aea_opt_loc: For option [name] of the [title] in the city of [city] provide, please, the google-maps location link in full URL format. Please do not use any URL shorteners or abbreviated links, as they may not work correctly. Link example: '[location]'
tt_descr: Write a seo-frendly description of [title] options in the city of [city] relevant for budget travellers like in this example: '[description]'
tt_links: Provide a list of relevant links for this description: '[description]' of the [title] options in the city of [city]. Put in your answer the links in full URL format. Please do not use any URL shorteners or abbreviated links, as they may not work correctly. Separate each link with a new line and do not include any commas, numbers, dishes or bullet points
ro_descr: Write a seo-frendly description of [title] another attractive cities in Europe where budget travellers must have to go to
ro_ro: Provide with most popular routes from [city] to another attractive cities in Europe relevant for budget travellers. Please return the city names only, separate each name with a new line and do not include any commas, numbers or bullet points
ro_ro_descr: Write a short seo-frendly description of [route] relevant for budget travellers like in this example: '[description]'
